definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
ostrich policy (sticking one's head in the sand, failing to acknowledge danger)

sentences.english: This is an aerial view of an ostrich farm near Pyongyang.
sentences.chinese: 这是平壤附近的一个鸵鸟农场的鸟瞰图。

sentences.english: Gavest thou the goodly wings unto the peacocks? or wings and feathers unto the ostrich?
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟的翅膀欢然搧展，岂是显慈爱的翎毛和羽毛么？

sentences.english: When you are really as big as ostrich, chicken's knowing clothes.
sentences.chinese: 当你真像鸵鸟那么大时，小鸡才会心服。

sentences.english: The histological structure of ostrich skin is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对鸵鸟皮及成革的组织结构进行了研究。

sentences.english: On Monday the ostrich picked flowers as a present to the girl.
sentences.chinese: 星期一，鸵鸟采了些花作为给女孩的礼物。

sentences.english: Sticking your head into the sand like an ostrich isn’t a viable option.
sentences.chinese: 像鸵鸟一样把头埋入土中假装自己不知道，是不行的。

sentences.english: Then saute ostrich meat until 70% done, add in peach to keep frying until cooked.
sentences.chinese: 然后将鸵鸟肉炒至七成熟，再加入蜜桃同炒至熟。

sentences.english: Wang said that in an ostrich egg on the sculpture so much content, is not easy.
sentences.chinese: 王斌说，在一只鸵鸟蛋上雕刻这么多内容，很不容易。

sentences.english: How did this Ostrich egg get here?
sentences.chinese: 这只鸵鸟蛋怎么在这儿？

sentences.english: Jack Horner:They're easier to come by. Ostriches cost a lot of money. That really is the only reason.
sentences.chinese: 小鸡更容易弄到，鸵鸟太贵了，只有这个原因。
他们能把鸵鸟毛弄白吗？

sentences.english: First I took a look-see at this ostrich.
sentences.chinese: 先来瞧眼这一只鸵鸟吧。

sentences.english: Car dealers area has eleven parks.
sentences.chinese: 车行区有袋鼠鸵鸟园等十一个园区。

sentences.english: Ostrich farms have nothing to do with improving the people's lives, " Kim Kyung-ryang of Kangwon National University said.
sentences.chinese: 鸵鸟农场却改善不了人民的生活。

sentences.english: A custom-made Leica M7 is covered with ostrich leather.
sentences.chinese: 一台客户定制的徕卡，外表面覆盖着鸵鸟皮。

definition: Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
